attributes.action: Save the creche at Orford Jubilee Neighbourhood Hub!
attributes.additional_details:
I’m on maternity leave, they’ve been so many times this year where I haven’t felt like myself and I honestly don’t know what I would have done without the creche. It gives me the opportunity to look after and prioritise my mental and physical health whilst my daughter is getting top year care. 
Not everybody has a village or a community around them, but by taking the service away you’ll be taking that village from me and so many other parents like me.
Please, please do not close it.
attributes.background: The Creche is currently listed as a potential closure to save money for Warrington Council, the saving would be £33K per year. Parents/carers have already advised they're happy for costs to increase, without it these parents wouldn't have access to the gym and the mental and physical heath benefits!

rejection.details: This falls outwith central Government responsibility and is presumably a matter for the local authority.
